abstract: In an interview, Google’s Android chief talks about Apple, Chrome, whether Android will “fork” and Froyo.
snippet: In an interview, Google’s Android chief talks about Apple, Chrome, whether Android will “fork” and Froyo.
lead_paragraph: Andy Rubin, a vice president for engineering at Google, leads one of the search giant’s most important efforts—the development of Android, Google’s open source platform for smartphones and other mobile devices.

headline.main: Google’s Andy Rubin on Everything Android
